title: Enabling Evolutionary Therapy in Metastatic Cancer Lacking Serum Biomarkers
summary: Evolutionary therapy (ET) aims to steer tumor evolution by adjusting treatment timing and dosing to control rather than eradicate tumor burden. Clinical use requires reliable monitoring of tumor dynamics to inform mathematical models that guide therapy.
